trans-unit.source: When runtime statistics are being captured, you can control the mode of processing by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> procedure.

seg-source.mrk: When runtime statistics are being captured, you can control the mode of processing by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> procedure.

target.mrk: When runtime statistics are being captured, you can control the mode of processing by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> procedure.

trans-unit.source: When the XPLAIN mode is set to 1, statements are compiled and optimized, but not executed; when the XPLAIN mode is set to 0 (the default), statements are compiled, optimized, and executed normally.

seg-source.mrk: When the XPLAIN mode is set to 1, statements are compiled and optimized, but not executed; when the XPLAIN mode is set to 0 (the default), statements are compiled, optimized, and executed normally.

target.mrk: When the XPLAIN mode is set to 1, statements are compiled and optimized, but not executed; when the XPLAIN mode is set to 0 (the default), statements are compiled, optimized, and executed normally.

trans-unit.source: The XPLAIN mode only matters when XPLAIN style has been enabled. See the <codeph><xref href="rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema.dita#rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_SCHEMA</xref></codeph> system procedure for more information.

seg-source.mrk: The XPLAIN mode only matters when XPLAIN style has been enabled.
See the <codeph><xref href="rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema.dita#rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_SCHEMA</xref></codeph> system procedure for more information.

target.mrk: The XPLAIN mode only matters when XPLAIN style has been enabled.
See the <codeph><xref href="rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema.dita#rref_syscs_set_xplain_schema">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_XPLAIN_SCHEMA</xref></codeph> system procedure for more information.

trans-unit.source: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

seg-source.mrk: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

target.mrk: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

trans-unit.source: To let <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> explain a statement without executing it:

seg-source.mrk: To let <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> explain a statement without executing it:

target.mrk: To let <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> explain a statement without executing it:

trans-unit.source: call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(1); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema('STATS'); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(1); select country from countries; call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(0); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema(''); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(0);

seg-source.mrk: call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(1); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema('STATS'); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(1); select country from countries; call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(0); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema(''); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(0);

target.mrk: call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(1); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema('STATS'); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(1); select country from countries; call syscs_util.syscs_set_runtimestatistics(0); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_schema(''); call syscs_util.syscs_set_xplain_mode(0);
